scenario:
Inseego Corp. (Nasdaq: INSG) has launched its next generation 5G outdoor CPE, the Inseego Wavemaker 5G Outdoor CPE FW3000. The device supports 5G Sub-6 GHz and 4G LTE Cat 20 with 4x4 MIMO, providing high-speed connectivity with download speeds up to 5 Gbps. Key features include high-gain, integrated directional antennas, enterprise-grade security, and durability with an IP67 rating. The FW3000 is designed for businesses in both urban and rural areas and is built with the Snapdragon X65 5G Modem-RF System. 

The device is equipped with a 2.5 Gbps PoE port and an intuitive Inseego Mobile App for easy installation. It also features comprehensive remote management capabilities through Inseego Connect, a full-service SaaS offering. The FW3000 is FIPS 140-2 certified and TAA compliant, meeting stringent security and trade compliance standards. 

Inseego Corp. is the industry leader in 5G Enterprise cloud WAN solutions, with millions of end customers and thousands of enterprise and SMB customers on its 4G, 5G, and cloud platforms. The company powers new business experiences by connecting distributed sites and workforces, securing enterprise data, and improving business outcomes with intelligent operational visibility.
